Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Charshman
Reviews.Content: we ordered a 8 channel dvr and camera starter set. the cameras are not the greatest, but they work. we have an area that is dark and the other cameras did not work at all in this area. so we ordered one of these cameras. and wow the only difference between day and night is the color turns off at night and is in black and white. the video or perforce is great. i will recommend this camera to anyone. we are going to order 7 more.

Reviews.Title: Clear, Crisp, Sharp, Day or Night Go Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Doitallbetter "Build it  better"
Reviews.Content: Purchased 10 of these a month back in a package deal with DVR.  Units have a great image.  Crystal clear, colors are great too.  With IR I can easily see all my interior and exterior locations.  The vision does drop off closer to the 80' listed in the speck.  I am using mine over Cat5E of varied lengths between 50 and 100' with balun units I purchased here on AMAZON!!!!  I cannot tell any difference in video quality between a unit connected with their packaged 60' cable and my set up.Only con that I could even dream up would be that the view angle is less than 90 degrees (as with most security cameras) so in my case where the unit is mounted in the corner of the room you don't get the full view of the room.I do have a number of Samsung products and have been very pleased with the quality.  This unit is not letting me down.Thanks AMAZON

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Wagaman
Reviews.Content: Bought these to supplement samsung 10 camera DVR kit I bought at Costo. They work great! System is great, ipad app is lacking and Mac support is poor, but they work great.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: dorothy
Reviews.Content: great .. it came with in two day .. and it was just what i was looking for .. would for sure say go for it .. if your looking for anything though samsung

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SDC-5340BC Weatherproof Night Vision Camera with 60ft cable included
